import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './home.scss' import Rodal from 'rodal'; import 'rodal/lib/rodal.css' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { apiCall } from '../../utils/apiCall'; function Home() { const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false); const {register, handleSubmit, formState: {errors} } = useForm(); function toggle(){ setVisible(prev=>!prev) } function submit(data){ apiCall('/task', 'post', data).then(res=>{ console.log("task post boldi"); toggle() }) } return (
